active_learning.discussion_prompt: Debate the ethical implications of reporting unencrypted sensitive data transmission in a penetration test versus exploiting it for educational purposes. Use real-world examples like the Equifax breach to support your arguments, considering legal standards such as PCI DSS and stakeholder impacts.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
